sections.summary: mortgage underwriter with 17 years of work experience who adapts to change. self-motivated with exceptional customer service skills and a determined work ethic. excels in problem solving, results driven, customer service, great verbal and written communication. core competencies includes risk analysis, credit evaluations, financial reporting, data entry, 10-key data entry, billing, and administrative support. highlights administrative duties mac call center office credit quality credit retail rrisk risk analysis credit risk sales clients data entry shipping documentation switchboard financial tax returns imaging underwriter insurance underwriting inventory workflow loan documentation written
